ComicInfo.Title: Bimbos From Hell!; Let's Eat Brains; The 1949 Slinky Slur; My First Arrest, My Last Incarceration; Two Old Birds; Mr. Forbes; Queer-People; The Return of Mrs. Kite; Ask Dr. Bunch; Memories Are Made of This

ComicInfo.Summary:
Bimbos From Hell!: Krystine remembers the good times she and Dori shared
Let's Eat Brains: Biff finds a recipe for brains and wants to try them
The 1949 Slinky Slur: Binky is tricked into hlaving his slinky
My First Arrest, My Last Incarceration: Lindsay is arrested for swearing at a policeman
Two Old Birds: Larry Farrel recalls a prank from his acting career
Mr. Forbes: Recollections of an abrasive neighbour
Queer-People: A parade of eccentrics
The Return of Mrs. Kite: Carol's grandmother returns, having eloped
Ask Dr. Bunch: Some self-analysis
Memories Are Made of This: Robert Crumb tries for a hot date in the 1970s
